scripts.build-extract-css: npm run setup && NODE_ENV=production CSS=extract rspack build
scripts.build-inline-css: npm run setup && NODE_ENV=production rspack build
scripts.build-optimize-css: npm run setup && SINGLE_CSS=true npm run build-extract-css
scripts.preview-extract-css: npm run setup && npm run build-extract-css && rspack preview
scripts.preview-inline-css: npm run setup && npm run build-inline-css && rspack preview
scripts.preview-optimized-css: npm run setup && npm run build-optimize-css && rspack preview
